thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Khoa
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Khoa

author: Khoa
title: Khoa
text: Glasses arrived quickly, but were missing parts and therefore not fit for purpose. They didn't seem new. Customer service was quick to respond, but there was some confusion re the refund process. Finally got a refund, after the glasses were out of stock. Very dissapointed as I just wanted the glasses which were originally sent is a new condition which is what I paid for.
